reviews.review: Игру не советую, чуть-чуть покатал, не зашло.
Good entry game to FPS beginners.
Muy divertido tiene todavía la esencia de CSGO.
shouldnt have vote to kick in comp. total garbo
Bon jeu malgré une communauté assez toxique
Toxic community but that doesn't trump the feeling of improvement of this game.
Игра ебаная помойка, обитель читеров и умственно отсталых детей. Найдите лучше другой шутер.
Very good game! I just got Overdrive gloves from my fourth case!
A very good game to play with friends and strangers alike.
i poo poo but when i play cs i pee pee

Ну игра была лучше когда была платной !!
А то читеров и так уже хватает !

This game has been the only thing holding my life together. A couple of years ago both my parents passed away in a car accident, and ever since I have been playing CSGO. I inherited all of their money once they passed, so I have been opening cases about everyday hoping to get a wicked skin to remember them from. I have spent easily 7k on cases and only have made back about 2.5k in skins so that sucks but one day i will get something worth it, I know it.
我超级喜欢这个产品呢其他玩家只需要几个箱子就可以出金。我能坚持到1000多个箱子都没开到呢，真的是对我有很大的关照呐真的很喜欢这个游戏奥
parce que bidule à une grosse chose entre les jambes

Welp, 9 hours away from hitting 3000 hours in CSGO. I'm a silver 4 because I play late at night and have the worst luck with teams, lots of drunks n druggy libtards... Anyways, the game is good, been playing it for a good 20 years, here's to 20 more :D
Good game, very complex but easy to get into.
es buen juego, con un competitivo que te ata por horas.
matchmaking sucks, lots of smurfs and hackers can be fun sometimes

Used to enjoy this game so damn much. Now as of late, especially within the last 2 weeks, there is literally no fucking way to combat the hackers. It makes this game so unplayable. Valve really needs to fix this game and restore it to its former glory. Spent way to much money on this POS to get a blatant hacker in every fucking competitive game I play. Valve please figure this out.
游戏体验好，兼容性强，我是社区大佬
Game itself is okay, but full tard russians and cheaters :)
хорошая игра заслуживает наминации года но не хватает обновлений
game is good. not worth getting into matchmaking if you're new because ranking system is broke. community servers are the better part of the game at this point in time.
you can learn rusian in real time
oyunu oyna kanser olmuyosun devam et ama baktın rus sürüsü var takım oluştur öyle oyna
Spoczko giereczka , miło sie spedza czas grając w nią. :-D
yeet in my skeet its fun
